db:abstract.db:para: The QTextToSpeechPlugin class is the base for all text-to-speech plug-ins.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: A plug-in implementation should derive from QTextToSpeechPlugin and re-implement createTextToSpeechEngine().

db:section.db:title: [virtual] QTextToSpeechEngine *QTextToSpeechPlugin::createTextToSpeechEngine(const QVariantMap &parameters, QObject *parent, QString *errorString) const

db:methodsynopsis.db:synopsisinfo: QTextToSpeechEngine * createTextToSpeechEngine(const QVariantMap &parameters, QObject *parent, QString *errorString) const

db:section.db:para: Factory method that is triggered by a call to QTextToSpeech::QTextToSpeech() when a provider name is given in the constructor and a text-to-speech plug-in matching the provider name was successfully loaded.
Value of parameters is currently always empty.
If an error occurs, the method should return 0 and (optionally) give a description of the error in errorString. In this case, QTextToSpeech::state() will return QTextToSpeech::BackendError.
If parent is 0, the caller takes the ownership of the returned engine instance.
